text:
Anyone dealt with OneTrust Auto-Block blocking linked JS files?

My module has a JS file linked and that file is being blocked by OneTrust. To unblock it, I need to be able to edit the script tag generated for that file. e.g.

Here's the tag that loads on the page right now:
<script src="<http://examplescript.com/javascript.js|examplescript.com/javascript.js>"></script>

Here's what I need it to be:
<script *data-ot-ignore* src="<http://examplescript.com/javascript.js|examplescript.com/javascript.js>"></script>

Anyone know how to do this?
